channel.title: Detail suggestions, new achievments
channel.description:
This is actually a pretty minor suggestion for black mesa, but I think the barnacles should throw out mostly xenian body parts on xen, having them spit exclusively human body parts was a bit strange back in half llife :smiley:
Also how about some new achievments? Maybe something about killing a certain number of headcrabs with crab corpses or finishing about 10 alien grunts with the crowbar, playing through a specific chapter with only the hivehand, etc.. There is much room for creativity!
Anyone got some ideas for achievments?

item.title: Detail suggestions, new achievments
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
For Xen I dunno, but for what we’ve got, would be nice some extra achievements.

Read full topic
